catch_line: Political Solicitations From City Officers And Employees.
full_text:
POLITICAL SOLICITATIONS FROM CITY OFFICERS AND EMPLOYEES.
	(Repealed by Ord. No. 172,890, Eff. 12/16/99.)

0.catch_line: Posting Of Telephone Number Of The Fire Department Emergency Ambulance Service In Eating Establishments.

1.catch_line: Hotels, Motels, Lodging And Rooming Houses – Register Required.

3.catch_line: Political Solicitations From City Officers And Employees.

4.catch_line: Sale Of Used Or Secondhand Hats.

5.catch_line: New Locks In Apartments – Installation Required.

6.catch_line: Tenant Relocation Assistance Where Apartments Are To Be Converted.

7.catch_line: Tenant Relocation Assistance Where Apartments Are To Be Demolished.

8.catch_line: Tenant Relocation Assistance Where Mobilehome Parks Are Changed To A Different Use.

11.catch_line: Display Of Aerosol Spray Paint Containers And Marker Pens.

12.catch_line: Excessive Price Increases During State Of Emergency.

14.catch_line: Self Service Display Of Tobacco Products.

15.catch_line: Spectators Prohibited At Speed Contests And Exhibitions Of Speed.

16.catch_line: Display And Sale Of Glass Etching Products.

17.catch_line: Sale Of Motor-Driven Cycles And Motorized Bicycles.

18.catch_line:
Narcotics, Violent Crime, Unlawful Weapon Or Ammunition
Crime, And Gang-Related Crime Eviction Program.

next_section.catch_line: Sale Of Used Or Secondhand Hats.
